ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Ninja
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn the art of the ninja, a tricky melee fighter with a few magical tricks up their sleeves.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Red Mage
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn the flourishing art of the Red Mage, a versatile and stylish weave of blade and magic.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Elemental Gunner
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn the path of the rapid-firing Elemental Gunner.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Troubadour
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically or magically gifted pawn the art of the Troubadour, an archer who supports their allies with arrow and song. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Troubadour
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically gifted pawn the art of the Troubadour, an archer who supports their allies with arrow and song.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Bombardier
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn to become a ranged explosives expert.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Reaper
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to attune to dark forces to become a nigh-demonic entity that dives directly into enemy positions to wreak havoc.

ThingDef.label: Combat Augments: Railbreaker
ThingDef.description: A physically adept pawn can use these augments to turn themselves into a Railbreaker, a reckless melee brawler that utilizes explosions at point-blank range. They have extreme firepower, but the recoil from their own moves is a constant risk.

ThingDef.label: Hippocratic Oath: Medic
ThingDef.description: Allows a physically adept pawn to swear the Hippocratic Oath to become a Medic. Medics are extremely capable doctors, and have an array of supportive abilities. They are very poor combatants, however.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Wind Mage
ThingDef.description: Teaches a gifted pawn how to cast wind spells. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Wind Mage
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined pawn how to harness the power of the wind.

ThingDef.label: Combat Inspiration: Gadgeteer
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically adept pawn the insightful style of thinking needed to become a Gadgeteer, an eccentric inventor with numerous odd tools to assist in daily life.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Chroma Mage
ThingDef.description: Teaches a gifted pawn how to embark on the multifaceted path of the Chroma Mage. The path of the Chroma Mage is one of adaptability and versatile mastery, albeit one that comes at a cost. They can learn a number of powerful spells from other classes, but their maximum level is 30 and they will never master every spell. Upon reading the scroll, the Chroma Mage will learn a random number of spells from its possible spell pool.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Samurai
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically adept pawn to become a Samurai, a master of Iai.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Scion
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically adept pawn to become a Scion, a melee fighter that channels the power of ancient aspects to aid them in combat.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Harbinger
ThingDef.description: Teaches a gifted pawn how to cast corruptive curses and hexes on their enemies. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Harbinger
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined pawn the corruptive arts of the Harbinger, teaching curse spells capable of breaking the mind and body of anyone who meets their ire.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Berserker
ThingDef.description: This book supposedly teaches one the combat art of the Berserker, but no one seems to get through more than the first few pages before ripping it apart and charging off to find the nearest enemy.

ThingDef.label: Twisted Inspiration: Plaguedoctor
ThingDef.description: This book teaches a physically-inclined pawn the twisted style of thinking of a Plaguedoctor, a half-crazed medieval physician who revels in poison, death, and decay. They are capable of performing questionable yet rapid surgeries, and have a variety of plague-inflicting attacks.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Cleric
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-gifted pawn how to become a Cleric. Clerics are capable of casting multiple specialized support spells in quick succession, but their main limiting factor is the toll of fatigue their spells take on their body. This arcane script is incomplete and the reader may not be able to learn some, or any, cleric spells.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Cleric
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-gifted pawn how to become a Cleric. Clerics are capable of casting multiple specialized support spells in quick succession, but their main limiting factor is the toll of fatigue their spells take on their body.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Arbormancer
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-gifted pawn how to harness the power of living plants to cast a variety of magic spells. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Arbormancer
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-gifted pawn how to harness the power of living plants to cast a variety of magic spells.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Chainwarden
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Chainwarden, a mobile mid-ranged fighter capable of dealing high area damage and disabling opponents with stuns and pulls.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Ambusher
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn the malicious fighting style of the Ambusher - a cold, patient fighter that lies in wait for their opponents with traps and devastating close-ranged abilities.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Saboteur
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn the art of the Saboteur, a fighter that specializes in going behind enemy lines and destroying key enemy buildings and defenses.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Keeper
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined to become a Keeper, a mage which specializes in base defense. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Keeper
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined pawn to become a Keeper, a mage which specializes in base defense.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Pridestalker
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn the art of the Pridestalker, a swift hunter that combines magic and bow to turn any fight into a vicious hunt.

ThingDef.label: Combat Style: Hawkeye
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn the ancient, disciplined art of dedicated bow combat.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Support Specialist
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Support Specialist, a versatile, shotgun-toting fighter capable of taking out key targets, holding the line, or supporting allies.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Scrapper
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Scrapper, a combatant that prefers unarmed brawling and has a large array of single-target disabling moves.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Oracle
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined pawn the path of the Oracle, a mage who derives their power from the stars. They are slow, deliberate spellcasters able to affect targets anywhere on the map with their supportive spells.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Oracle
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-gifted pawn the path of the Oracle, a mage who derives their power from the stars; slow and deliberate spellcasters able to affect targets anywhere on the map with their supportive spells. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Mystic
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically adept pawn the esoteric arts of the Mystic, a versatile mid-ranged fighter that utilizes the power of spiritual energy to take down their foes.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Spellbreaker
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically adept pawn the combative style of the Spellbreaker, a fighter that excels at countering and disabling enemy fighters and mages.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Duskbringer
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn to become a Duskbringer, a fighter that harnesses the dual destructive forces of light and darkness to overpower their foes.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Thunderblessed
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically adept pawn how to harness the pure power of electricity, gaining access to heavily destructive, close-ranged attacks.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Deadeye
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn the cold arts of a Deadeye, an unparalleled sniper that utilizes skill, aiming tactics, and a trusty gun to make sure their targets don't survive, no matter where they are. They are capable of utilizing magic for even deadlier attacks, but they do not regenerate mana passively.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Spellthief
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn the trickster arts of the Spellthief, a mage well-suited to infiltrating and sabotaging enemies. They can copy abilities from allies and enemies.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Dragoon
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Dragoon, an agile knight that has absorbed the power of dragons, granting them incredible resistance to heat as well as the power to take to the skies and divebomb their enemies from above.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Black Mage
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-gifted pawn how to become a Black Mage, a specialized combat mage capable of raining endless destructive magic on their foes. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Black Mage
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined pawn how to become a Black Mage, a specialized combat mage capable of raining endless destruction on their foes.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Scholar
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined pawn how to become a Scholar, a tactician mage that excels at protecting and supporting their allies in combat. They are very poor direct combatants. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Scholar
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined pawn how to become a Scholar, a tactician mage that excels at protecting and supporting their allies in combat. They are very poor direct combatants.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Gunbreaker
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Gunbreaker, an unorthodox fighter that prefers to use ranged weapons in melee combat. They are capable of charging up and unleashing multiple devastating attacks in quick succession.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Gunner
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Gunner, a fighter that prefers ranged weapons with powerful single-shot capabilities. They are capable of charging up and unleashing rapid bursts of suppressive fire.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Warrior
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined how to become a Warrior, a resilent melee fighter trained to survive on the front lines of battle.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Nomad
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined how to become a Nomad, a resilient bow-fighter that fights at both melee and range.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Guardian
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn the discipline of the Guardian, a stalwart protector that combines sword and magic to defend their allies.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Holosmith
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Holosmith, a fighter that harnesses the unique Photon Forge, allowing them to harness the pure power of light to destroy their foes.

ThingDef.label: Box of Dice: Gambler
ThingDef.description: It's a box of dice and playing cards. A physically or magically-inclined pawn can probably use these to become a Gambler, a versatile fighter that plays their hand according to fate's whim.

ThingDef.label: Book of Recipes: Chef
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a chef, someone capable of aiding their allies with food.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Miner
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Miner, a trained specialist capable of demolishing ore and rock with ease.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Striker
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Striker, an unarmed combatant that is an aggressive offshoot of the Monk -- they forsake defense and healing in exchange for a swift and offensive combat style.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Rune Knight
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically gifted pawn the path of the Rune Knight, a specialized combat mage that compresses mana into runes for later use, allowing them to prepare for future encounters. They are capable of offensive, defensive, and healing magic. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Rune Knight
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically gifted pawn the path of the Rune Knight, a specialized combat mage that compresses mana into runes for later use. They are capable of offensive, defensive, and healing magic.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Blossom Blader
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Blossom Blader, a graceful bladedancer highly attuned to nature. Their rapid and debilitating attacks are fueled by herbs gathered by interacting with plants.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Mech Hunter
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Mech Hunter, a specialized fighter that excels at dealing with Mechanoids and heavily armored foes.

ThingDef.label: Combat Form: Gunslinger
ThingDef.description: Teaches a physically-inclined pawn how to become a Gunslinger, a mobile ranged fighter capable of blanketing the battlefield in suppressive fire.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Shadowbringer
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn how to become a Shadowbringer, a resilient melee fighter that channels the power of darkness to annihilate their foes.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Warden
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically or physically inclined pawn how to become a Warden, a resilient melee fighter that is an offshoot of the Geomancer.

ThingDef.label: Combat Augments: Chempunk
ThingDef.description: A physically adept pawn can use these augments to turn themselves into a Chempunk, a melee fighter whose own body is a poisonous weapon. They dose themselves with dangerous drugs to attack their enemies and shrug off damage, but overuse of their abilities can be dangerous to themselves.

ThingDef.label: Tome of Insight: Explorer
ThingDef.description: Grants wisdom and insight to a physically or magically-inclined pawn, allowing them to become an Explorer, a class with no abilities of their own, but capable of learning almost any scroll ability, even ones normally locked to other classes. The tome curiously appears to be blank, but true Explorers understand what it means.

ThingDef.label: Torn Script: Architect
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined to become an Architect, a mage that applies their magic to structures, allowing them to raise or destroy buildings at a moment's whim. Architects rarely directly engage their foes; they prefer to shape the landscape itself to be inhospitable to their enemies. Most of their spells can be cast from anywhere on the map. The scroll is incomplete and may result in the pawn not learning every spell right away.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Tome: Architect
ThingDef.description: Teaches a magically-inclined pawn to become an Architect, a mage that applies their magic to structures, allowing them to raise or destroy buildings at a moment's whim. Architects rarely directly engage their foes; they prefer to shape the landscape itself to be inhospitable to their enemies. Most of their spells can be cast from anywhere on the map.

ThingDef.label: Fighter Skill: Explosive Satchel
ThingDef.description: Teaches a fighter class how to toss a pouch filled with explosives to a location, dealing small AoE damage.

ThingDef.label: Fighter Skill: Lightning Satchel
ThingDef.description: Teaches a fighter class how to toss a pouch filled with lightning crystals to a location that disables mechanoids and turrets.

ThingDef.label: Fighter Skill: Ash Satchel
ThingDef.description: Teaches a fighter class how to toss a pouch filled with ash to a location, extinguishing flames in a small area.

ThingDef.label: Fighter Skill: Glare
ThingDef.description: Teaches a fighter class how to direct a bone-chilling glare towards a single enemy, stunning them briefly.

ThingDef.label: Fighter Skill: Evasive Leap
ThingDef.description: Teaches a fighter class the Evasive Leap ability, allowing them to leap over small obstacles, while also becoming briefly untargetable.

ThingDef.label: Bow Skill: Quick Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a bow-using class how to quickly nock and fire an arrow at a close target.

ThingDef.label: Bow Skill: Crippling Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a bow-using class how to fire an expertly-aimed arrow to cripple a foe, reducing their movement speed.

ThingDef.label: Bow Skill: Grapple Arrow
ThingDef.description: Teaches a bow-using class how to fire a grappling hook onto terrain or buildings, pulling themselves to the new location.

ThingDef.label: Bow Skill: Marksman's Vow
ThingDef.description: Teaches a bow-using class how to heighten their focus, gaining increased shooting speed and energy regeneration for a brief period of time.

ThingDef.label: Samurai Skill: Temperance
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Samurai how to hone their focus to gain increased attack speed and greatly reduced casting time for a short duration.

ThingDef.label: Samurai Skill: Blade Parry
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Samurai how to parry most attacks for a brief moment.

ThingDef.label: Deadeye Skill: Grappling Hook
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Deadeye how to fire a grappling hook onto terrain or buildings, pulling themselves to the new location.

ThingDef.label: Deadeye Skill: One In The Chamber
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Deadeye a skill that instantly generates a small amount of mana for themselves, on a long cooldown.

ThingDef.label: Druid Spell: Tailwind
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Druid how to bless an ally with magical winds, granting them Haste and increased accuracy for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Arbormancer Spell: Bramble Patch
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Arbormancer how to rapidly grow a temporary hazard of thorny vines. The vines can be used to power their other abilities.

ThingDef.label: Druid/Arbormancer Spell: Miracle of Nature
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Druid or Arbormancer how to bless a large area, summoning numerous young trees.

ThingDef.label: Druid Spell: Barkskin
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Druid how to cast a spell on an ally that grants them increased armor for a moderate duration, but also increased susceptibility to heat damage.

ThingDef.label: Deadeye/E-Gunner Spell: Bullet Time
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Deadeye or Elemental Gunner how to magically enhance their focus, granting them Haste and increases to shooting stats for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Sniper Skill: Death's Judgment
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Sniper how to aim an incredibly lethal headshot with greater range.

ThingDef.label: Sniper Skill: Heartpiercer
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Sniper how to shoot a special bullet that instantly destroys a target's armor and shreds through the target, leaving them with a gaping wound that bleeds profusely.

ThingDef.label: Gunslinger Skill: Cover Fire
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunslinger how to fire a distracting shot at a target, dealing damage and stunning for a brief time. Reloads a shell.

ThingDef.label: Gunslinger Skill: Nanoseeker
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunslinger how to toss a nanotech device at a target which latches onto them and forcibly disarms them.

ThingDef.label: Gunslinger/Sniper Skill: Gunflame
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunslinger or Sniper how to fire an incendiary round which deals major damage to a single target and minor damage in an area around them, potentially setting enemies ablaze.

ThingDef.label: Gunslinger Skill: Breakstep
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunslinger how to cleverly discharge a shell to leap to a nearby area. Can jump over walls. Costs a shell.

ThingDef.label: Gunslinger Skill: Breachfire
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunslinger how to shoot special shells that detonate on impact, dealing area damage and bonus damage to structures. Costs three shells.

ThingDef.label: Enchanter Spell: Renew
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Enchanter a spell that restores the condition of items.

ThingDef.label: Sniper Skill: Disarming Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Sniper how to disarm a target enemy with an expertly-placed shot.

ThingDef.label: Sniper/Soldier Skill: Stim Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Sniper or Super Soldier how to deliver emergency combat stimulants to a distant ally.

ThingDef.label: Super Soldier Skill: Serum Overload
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Super Soldier how to inject themselves with a drug that will overload the serum in their body, granting them vastly increased combat capabilities for a short time at the cost of losing some of their long-term serum development.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Support Specialist Skill: Jump Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Support Specialist how to leap at an area, delivering area damage where they land.

ThingDef.label: Support Specialist Skill: Handheld Rocket
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Support Specialist how to fire a small explosive rocket to an area that deals minor damage to units but major damage to structures. Does not require line of sight to fire.

ThingDef.label: Demonkin Spell: Eldritch Barrage
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warlock or Succubus how to cast a series of shadowy blasts in an area.

ThingDef.label: Lightning Spell: Overcharge
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Lightning Mage how to imbue allies in an area with electrical energy, granting them a burst of greatly increased energy regeneration and movement speed.

ThingDef.label: Ice Spell: Frost Armor
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Ice Mage how to protect a single ally in a layer of magical frost, providing increased armor values, resistance to heat and flames, and a mild regenerative effect for a long period of time.

ThingDef.label: Fire Spell: Incinerate
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Fire Mage how to engulf a single target in searing flames. The ability resets its cooldown if it overkills the target.

ThingDef.label: Summoner Spell: Elemental Creation
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Summoner how to cast a spell on an area of pawns, summoning lesser elementals for each pawn in the cast radius.

ThingDef.label: Architect Spell: Elemental Rift
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Architect how to summon multiple elemental rifts at a location. Hostile elementals will pour forth from the rifts until they are destroyed.

ThingDef.label: Gladiator Skill: Grand Challenge
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gladiator how to send a mocking challenge to all pawns in an area, greatly increasing the time it takes for them to aim and cast abilities for a short time. Has no effect on pure melee combat.

ThingDef.label: Gladiator Skill: Shield Stance
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gladiator how to enter a blocking stance, reducing their movement speed and accuracy but greatly increasing their armor for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Ranger Skill: Troll Unguent
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Ranger how to apply a long-lasting and powerful regenerative ointment to an ally.

ThingDef.label: Ranger Skill: Hunter's Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Ranger how to shoot a quick, distracting arrow at a target, granting the Ranger stealth and increased movement speed for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Ranger Skill: Poison Volley
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Ranger how to shoot a volley of arrows into nearby plants, causing them to explode with noxious gas.

ThingDef.label: Bladedancer Skill: Blade's Edge
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Bladedancer how to drop a blade at their current location, blinking back to it after five seconds have passed.

ThingDef.label: Psionic Skill: Approaching Storm
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Psionic how to fly evasively to a location, while firing a psionic blast at the landing location.

ThingDef.label: Chroma Mage Spell: Chromatic Flash
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Chroma Mage how to channel a unique weave of magical energy into a target, granting them stealth, superspeed, and increased energy regeneration for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Fighter Skill: Vengeance
ThingDef.description: Teaches a fighter how to push their body beyond its limits, granting them greatly increased stats, stamina regeneration, brief projectile deflection, and immunity to pain for a short time. However, after the effect is over, they will fall unconscious for more than a day.

ThingDef.label: Mage Spell: Effulgence
ThingDef.description: Teaches a mage how to convert their own vital energies to mana in a desperate situation, granting them a surge of mana regeneration and casting speed for a short time, as well as instantly cleansing any Arcane Weakness and Mana Sickness. However, after the effect is over, they will fall unconscious for more than a day.

ThingDef.label: Oracle Spell: Planetary Force
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Oracle a spell that grants a target every single Horoscope buff at once, as well as a short burst of energy regeneration.

ThingDef.label: Oracle Spell: Grand Expanse
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Oracle how to resurrect a recently deceased creature.

ThingDef.label: Mystic Skill: Ofuda Storm
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Mystic how to toss a storm of explosive talismans to a location. This ability drains the Mystic's entire Stamina pool, throwing more talismans based on the amount of Stamina drained. This ability cannot be cast while holding ranged weaponry.

ThingDef.label: Harbinger Spell: Sacrificial Pact
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Harbinger a spell that sacrifices the life of a pawn to resurrect another. This spell cannot be cast by pawns incapable of violence.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Spell: Disarm
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Arcane Mage how to manipulate the space around a target, forcibly disarming them.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Spell: Arcane Wall
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Arcane Mage how to create a temporary wall perpendicular to their current location.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Spell: Force Missile
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Arcane Mage how to fire a wave of missiles at multiple enemies, dealing damage and having a high chance of causing confusion.

ThingDef.label: Arcane Spell: Clear Mind
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Arcane Mage how to clear their mind and attune to the elements, granting a brief surge of mana regeneration.

ThingDef.label: Ninja Spell: Doton
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Ninja how to leap to a nearby location, then summon a ring of stone around them. If an enemy is targeted, they will take damage and be kicked into the summoned walls of earth, temporarily stunning them. The target will then be trapped together with the Ninja for a short time until the walls disperse.

ThingDef.label: Ninja Spell: Hyosho Ranryu
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Ninja how to throw ice shuriken at an enemy, dealing major damage to a single target and stunning for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Priest Spell: Flash Heal
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Priest how to cast a spell that delivers a massive amount of healing to a single target, fully healing most creatures.

ThingDef.label: Priest/Cleric Spell: Bless Item
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Cleric or Priest a spell that restores the condition of items on the ground. Cleanses taint from items that are fully repaired.

ThingDef.label: Dragoon Skill: Elusive Jump
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Dragoon how to jump to a distant target location. Capable of clearing obstacles.

ThingDef.label: Dragoon Skill: Blood of the Dragon
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Dragoon how to channel draconic energies, temporarily temporarily increasing their maximum stamina pool and granting them a short burst of stamina regeneration, as well as granting bonuses to melee combat stats.

ThingDef.label: Dragoon Skill: Stardiver
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Dragoon how to jump to a target location while hurling a flaming spear ahead of them, dealing massive damage in an area. Nearly impossible to use without first casting Blood of the Dragon.

ThingDef.label: Black Mage Spell: Aetherial Manipulation
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Black Mage how to instantly blink to the side of a nearby pawn.

ThingDef.label: Black Mage Spell: Manaward
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Black Mage how to crystallize mana around their body, shielding them from all damage for a short time, or until the shield breaks.

ThingDef.label: Black Mage Spell: Despair
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Black Mage how to cast a spell that deals massive damage to a single target.

ThingDef.label: Black Mage Spell: Sharpcast
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Black Mage how to cast a spell that grants them maximum stacks of Umbral Ice and Astral Fire.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Black Mage Spell: Xenoglossy
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Black Mage how to cast a spell that deals massive damage in an area, but disables their mana pool for an extended period of time.

ThingDef.label: Red Mage Spell: Contre Sixte
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Red Mage how to fire projectiles of concentrated energy at enemies in an area.

ThingDef.label: Spellthief Skill: Pickpocket
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Spellthief how to use sleight-of-hand to disarm a target, leaving their weapon lying on the ground.

ThingDef.label: Scholar Spell: Fey Blessing
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Scholar how to cast a spell which grants health regeneration to an ally. This spell summons the Spirit of Light if it's away, or dismisses it if it's active.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Scholar Spell: Guiding Light
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Scholar how to resurrect a recently deceased creature.

ThingDef.label: Gunbreaker Skill: Aethercall
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunbreaker how to swap to a melee stance for a short time, granting increased melee stats and armor, as well as generating a cartridge, but at the cost of rendering casting and shooting ineffective for the duration of the stance.

ThingDef.label: Gunbreaker Skill: Hypervelocity
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunbreaker how to expend a cartridge to fire a long-ranged shot at an enemy, dealing damage and granting the Gunbreaker greatly increased movement speed for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Gunbreaker Skill: Continuation
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunbreaker how to directly utilize their vital energies for an explosive attack, rather than consuming a cartridge. Builds up heat in the body that can be dangerous if the ability is overused.

ThingDef.label: Gunbreaker Skill: Superbolide
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunbreaker how to call upon the final reserves of their energy to grant themselves maximum cartridges and instantly cleanse themselves of any heat build-up from Continuation, as well as granting them greatly increased stamina regeneration for a brief time. However, after the effect is over, they will fall unconscious for more than a day.

ThingDef.label: Gunbreaker Skill: Double Down
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunbreaker how to expend cartridges to leap to a target location, blasting the area when they land.

ThingDef.label: Gunner Skill: Head Graze
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunner how to fire a quick shot at a target, briefly stunning and silencing them.

ThingDef.label: Gunner Skill: Nanite Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunner how to fire a nanite shot into a target, boosting their Sharp Armor by 100% for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Gunner Skill: Clean Reload
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunner how to leap evasively to a target location, while granting themselves Battery Charge and removing the stamina drain effects of Clean Shot and Gauss Round.

ThingDef.label: Gunner Skill: Flame Splitter
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunner how to fire a blazing shot at multiple targets in an area, potentially setting them ablaze.

ThingDef.label: Gunner Skill: Barrel Stabilizer
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gunner how to stabilize their weapon, granting Battery Charge and removing the stamina drain and reduction effects of Heat Blast, Gauss Round, Drill, and Drill Mk2.

ThingDef.label: Death Knight Skill: Opening Ritual
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Death Knight how to instantly build up hatred before a battle.

ThingDef.label: Death Knight Skill: Dark Grasp
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Death Knight how to pull a nearby target to them.

ThingDef.label: Death Knight Skill: Abyssal Drain
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Death Knight how to blast an area with dark energy while granting themselves regeneration.

ThingDef.label: Death Knight Skill: The Blackest Night
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Death Knight how to channel dark energy around a target to form a powerful damage shield for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Chempunk Skill: Quick Vent
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Chempunk how to quickly vent away Rot for a short burst of movement speed. Removes 10 Rot.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Chempunk Skill: Regulator
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Chempunk how to stabilize the toxicity in their body. Sets Rot to 45 and sets Toxic Buildup to 5%, and removes side effects from torment damage.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Chempunk Skill: Noxious Blast
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Chempunk how to vent out a massive amount of toxin at once, blasting the area around them, dealing torment damage in a large area. Costs 100 Rot to cast.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Chempunk Skill: Juggernaut
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Chempunk how to overload their body with combat chemicals, setting Rot stacks to 100 and granting a strong damage shield for a short time.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Shadowbringer Skill: Plunge
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Shadowbringer how to leap to a nearby location and plunge their weapon into the ground, summoning Grave Blades to strike the area.

ThingDef.label: Shadowbringer Spell: Dark Mind
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Shadowbringer how to focus dark energy, granting damage reduction and increasing spell damage for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Shadowbringer Spell: Call of Darkness
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Shadowbringer how to expend mana to instantly grant them Hate.

ThingDef.label: Shadowbringer Skill: Blood Weapon
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Shadowbringer how to consume their hatred to grant them Haste for a brief time.

ThingDef.label: Shadowbringer Skill: Syphon Strike
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Shadowbringer how to consume hate to deal damage in an area at range, while also granting themselves increased mana regeneration for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Shadowbringer Skill: Living Dead
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Shadowbringer how to become immune to pain and bleeding out for a short time, as well as granting them a small damage shield. Costs Hate.

ThingDef.label: Shadowbringer Skill: Quietus
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Shadowbringer how to summon Grave Blades to deal major damage to all adjacent targets.

ThingDef.label: Shadowbringer Spell: Oblation
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Shadowbringer how to call forth crackling energy that damages them and everything nearby, which resolves into numerous Grave Blades that repeatedly strike the area.

ThingDef.label: Warden Spell: Magnetic Aura
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warden how to protect an ally with a shield that reflects projectiles, which lasts for a short time or until it is broken.

ThingDef.label: Warden Spell: Eruption
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warden how to call forth an eruption of earth around terrain or buildings, dealing damage in an area.

ThingDef.label: Warden Spell: Churning Earth
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warden how to bombard an area with numerous boulders.

ThingDef.label: Monk Skill: Touch of Death
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Monk how to quickly strike five critical pressure points, instantly killing a target after a brief delay.

ThingDef.label: Monk Skill: Serenity
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Monk how to focus their chi inwards, granting them brief invulnerability.

ThingDef.label: Monk Skill: Whistling Wind
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Monk how to leap evasively to a location, while instantly granting themselves 35 Chi and briefly granting them Haste.

ThingDef.label: Commander Skill: Provoke
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Commander how to provoke a nearby enemy, sending them into a berserk rage.

ThingDef.label: Commander Skill: Diplomatic Negotiations
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Commander how to deliver a long speech to a nearby pawn. If the pawn is from another faction and willing to listen, faction relations will instantly increase.

ThingDef.label: Commander Skill: Fire At Will
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Commander how to issue efficient orders to nearby allies, granting them greatly increased attack speed for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Nomad Skill: Skirmisher's Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Nomad how to leap towards a target while firing a precise shot from their weapon. Costs Chi.

ThingDef.label: Nomad/Striker Skill: Riddle of Flame
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Nomad or Striker how to set their spirit ablaze, granting them maximum Chi, but disabling their Stamina pool for a moderate duration.

ThingDef.label: Nomad Skill: Light Arrow
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Nomad how to fire an arrow of condensed light to a location, dealing major damage. Drains all of the Nomad's remaining Chi.

ThingDef.label: Striker Skill: Howling Fist
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Striker how to utilize wind pressure to deal damage to and disarm a nearby enemy.

ThingDef.label: Striker Skill: Rockbreaker
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Striker how to strike the ground with resonating force, creating rupturing explosions centered around buildings or terrain in an area.

ThingDef.label: Paladin Spell: Hammer Bolt
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Paladin how to lob a magical hammer at target, dealing damage and stunning for a brief time.

ThingDef.label: Paladin Spell: Taunt
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Paladin how to taunt nearby targets.

ThingDef.label: Paladin Spell: Retribution
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Paladin how to bless a target with a shield that reflects most projectiles for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Warrior/Guardian Skill: Sheltron
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warrior or Guardian how to take a defensive stance, blocking most attacks for a brief moment.

ThingDef.label: Warrior Skill: Onslaught
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warrior how to leap to a target location, dealing damage in a small area around them when they land. Costs Chi.

ThingDef.label: Warrior Skill: Infuriate
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warrior how to focus their energy, granting them a large amount of Chi, but inflicting Inertia on themselves, disabling their Stamina pool for a moderate duration.

ThingDef.label: Warrior Skill: Inner Chaos
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warrior how to deliver a massive finishing attack, at the cost of all of their remaining Chi and Stamina, as well as inflicting Inertia on themselves for a moderate duration.

ThingDef.label: Warrior Skill: Shake It Off
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Warrior how to grant themselves a damage shield for a short time, as well as granting a brief immunity to pain and bleeding out, and cleansing themselves of Inertia.

ThingDef.label: Guardian Skill: Tempered Will
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Guardian how to enter Sword Oath for a brief time at no cost, but silencing themselves for the same duration.

ThingDef.label: Guardian Skill: Requiescat
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Guardian how to expend stamina to greatly increase the casting speed and damage of their next damaging ability.

ThingDef.label: Guardian Skill: Confiteor
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Guardian how to split the ground with a powerful finishing attack that also grants them blocking for a short duration. Casting this ability grants Requiescat for a short duration and ends Sword Oath.

ThingDef.label: Guardian Spell: Circle of Scorn
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Guardian how to consecrate an area with wrathful energy, causing themselves and all nearby creatures to begin taking repeated damage over time. The Guardian can block this damage.

ThingDef.label: Holosmith Skill: Coolant Blast
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Holosmith how to spray a coolant on themselves, granting themselves health regeneration and extending the duration of Photon Forge.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Holosmith Skill: Cold Open
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Holosmith how to enter Photon Forge, but at a lowered stamina cap, potentially locking them out of casting some of their abilities.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Holosmith Skill: Photon Wall
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Holosmith how to project a barrier of light to a target, protecting them from most incoming damage for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Holosmith Skill: Prime Light Cannon
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Holosmith how to fire a blast of condensed light energy at a location, dealing major damage. This ability ends Photon Forge.

ThingDef.label: Troubadour Skill: Empyreal Arrow
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Troubadour how to fire a musical shot at a target, extending the duration of Pitch Perfect.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Troubadour Skill: Swiftsong
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Troubadour how to play a song that grants themselves or an ally Superspeed for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Troubadour Spell: Warden's Paean
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Troubadour how to play a song for an ally that grants them a temporary damage shield.

ThingDef.label: Troubadour Spell: Impromptu
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Troubadour how to improvise on the fly, temporarily enabling their stamina pool but at a reduced capacity.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Troubadour Skill: Burst Shot
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Troubadour how to fire an arrow that deals major damage to a single target.

ThingDef.label: Troubadour Skill: Misery's End
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Troubadour how to quickly fire an arrow that deals major damage. The ability costs little and recharges quickly, but casting this ability reduces the duration of Pitch Perfect and Impromptu by 8 seconds.

ThingDef.label: Troubadour Skill: Apex Arrow
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Troubadour how to fire a singing shot at a location, stunning all nearby units for a long duration. Using this ability ends Pitch Perfect.

ThingDef.label: Gambler Spell: Destiny
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gambler how to instantly blink to a location anywhere on the map.

ThingDef.label: Gambler Skill: Royal Road
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Gambler how to burn a card, dealing damage in an area, then ending access to their stamina pool and enabling their mana pool.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Gambler Skill: Deck Blast
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gambler how to toss the whole deck at their enemies, dealing major area damage but inflicting themselves with Silence and Inertia.

ThingDef.label: Gambler Spell: Sleeve Draw
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Gambler how to cheat, enabling all of their resource pools at once.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Gadgeteer/Miner Skill: Old Headlight
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Gadgeteer or Miner how to put together an old headlight from gathered junk. The headlight is powerful enough to grow plants and doesn't require any external power, and lasts until it is deconstructed or destroyed. The Gadgeteer has no limit on how many headlights they can place, but it takes a long time to make one.

ThingDef.label: Miner Skill: Collapsing Column
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Miner how to quickly construct a makeshift column that's capable of holding up a roof. The column is extraordinarily fragile and designed to fail -- it will collapse if an unaware pawn comes too close. When the column collapses, it deals damage in a small area around it.

ThingDef.label: Miner Skill: Truth of Mountains
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Miner how to create a temporary structure that periodically heals nearby targets.

ThingDef.label: Miner Skill: Rune of Lightning
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Miner how to create a temporary structure that periodically shoots lightning at nearby targets.

ThingDef.label: Ambusher Skill: Caltrops
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Ambusher how to toss caltrops at a location, damaging units that cross the area.

ThingDef.label: Ambusher Skill: Proximity Charge
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Ambusher how to place a proximity mine at their current location, which detonates when an enemy walks over it.

ThingDef.label: Ambusher Skill: Poison Trap
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Ambusher how to place a poison trap at their current location, which detonates when an enemy walks over it.

ThingDef.label: Ambusher/Miner Skill: The Big One
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Ambusher or Miner how to place a barrel filled with explosives, which deals damage in a large area when triggered.

ThingDef.label: Ambusher Skill: Ambush
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Ambusher how to deal massive damage to targets in an area in a flash of steel.

ThingDef.label: Spellbreaker Skill: Stifling Winds
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Spellbreaker how to call upon stifling winds, inflicting Inertia and Silence in a large area, as well as having a chance to disarm units that have been hit.

ThingDef.label: Chronomancer Spell: Unstable Singularity
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Chronomancer how to rewind the time of buildings and terrain in an area, instantly destroying them. Destroyed structures collapse into an Unstable Singularity, which explodes after a short time.

ThingDef.label: Wind Mage Spell: Fey Winds
ThingDef.description: Targets a location anywhere in the world, then calls upon magical winds to instantly move all pawns and items in a 7 cell radius around the target location to the caster.

ThingDef.label: Rune Knight Spell: Reflect
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Rune Knight how to protect a target with a shield that reflects projectiles for a brief time. Costs 5 runes to cast.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Rune Knight Spell: Balefire
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Rune Knight how to call down utter destruction on an area. Costs 15 runes to cast.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Apothecary/Blossom Blader Skill: Belt Pouch
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Apothecary or Blossom Blader a skill that instantly gives a small amount of herbs when used.

ThingDef.label: Apothecary Skill: Refined Mana Potion
ThingDef.description: Teaches an Apothecary how to toss a refined mana potion to an ally, which instantly grants an ally mana with no risk of overdose or addiction.

ThingDef.label: Blossom Blader Skill: Bladestorm
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Blossom Blader how to repeatedly toss knives at all targets in an area, dealing damage and stunning each target hit. Costs stamina.

ThingDef.label: Blossom Blader Skill: Fallen Leaf
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Blossom Blader how to strike numerous enemies in an area in the blink of an eye.

ThingDef.label: Ravenous Skill: Second Stomach
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Ravenous how to convert Food to Acidosis.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Ravenous Skill: Throne of Gluttony
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Ravenous how to fully suppress their need for rest at the cost of increasing their hunger.

ThingDef.label: Ravenous Skill: Living Artillery
ThingDef.description:
Teaches a Ravenous how to bombard an area with toxic gas at the cost of Acidosis.
[Can't be learned by Explorer.]

ThingDef.label: Mech Hunter Skill: Blackpowder
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Mech Hunter how to discharge a Nanite Bullet, creating an instant EMP centered around themselves as well as granting themselves Stealth for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Mech Hunter Skill: Final Salvo
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Mech Hunter how to instantly create a full stack of Nanite Bullets by utilizing their own life energy. Casting the ability inflicts them with Inertia, disabling their Stamina pool for a long time afterwards.

ThingDef.label: Mech Hunter Skill: Orbital EMP
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Mech Hunter how to call down an orbital EMP down on a location, stunning Mechanoids for an extremely long duration. Can be cast anywhere on the map.

ThingDef.label: Mage Spell: Erase
ThingDef.description: Teaches a mage how to cast a spell on an ally that reduces Arcane Weakness on a target, as well as removing Mana Sickness and Silence.

ThingDef.label: Wayfarer Skill: Haste
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Wayfarer how to grant themselves Haste, doubling their attack speed for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Wayfarer Skill: Medigel
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Wayfarer how to apply a topical ointment to an ally, improving health regeneration and soothing pain.

ThingDef.label: Wanderer Spell: Lucky Star
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Wanderer how to draw a small amount of mana from the environment, granting them slightly increased mana regeneration for a short time.

ThingDef.label: Wanderer Spell: Flight
ThingDef.description: Teaches a Wanderer how to fly to a distant location.

ThingDef.label: Fighter Skill: Martial Training
ThingDef.description: Teaches a fighter class how to automatically expend their stamina for experience and minor speed buffs.

ThingDef.label: Mage Spell: Magic Training
ThingDef.description: Teaches a mage how to automatically expend their mana for experience and minor increases to research and learning speed.
